title: script using player found, please investigate
body:
he was suspicious when I played against him at once, but I can't be 100% sure about this, until today's morning, my friend told me that this scripter ruined his game. Then I op.gg his summoner name and decided to get a closer look at his plays

====================================================================
For EVERY lee sin Q casted on a moving enemy champion, his q hit the very last position when that champion is about to move to the next box, EVERY, I mean every single situation when he Q a moving champion!
if you slow down the replay to .25x, you'll see this. the reason why he could hit his q is that he could q the position that the champ was about to move to the next box, it seems that q would not hit the champ because they are not on the same line, yet, because of the moving mechanics, the system would consider the champion is still in his last position


PLEASE RIOT, a good lee sin player can do this easily, but what if he could do it EVERY time in EVERY game! is there something wrong??? 

Please stop the script players and maintain a good sportsman like environment!

replies.body:
Hey iRejiax,

I edited out the Summoner names/screenshots with summoner names. Boards isn't the place to report players.

You can open a support ticket to send through the screenshots and the report on what happened.

srsly, its impossible to report a player if you are not playing a game with him.. just like this one, and I couldn't even find a category to report a player in support....even though I do reported him by selecting the ticket to be some questions about league of legends.....
